original_title: M.A.M.Ó.N.: Monitor Against Mexicans Over Nationwide
overview: M.A.M.O.N. (Monitor Against Mexicans Over Nationwide) is a satirical fantasy sci-fi short film that explores with black humor and lots of VFX the outrageous consequences of Donald Trump´s plan of banning immigration and building an enormous wall on the Mexico - US border.
title: M.A.M.Ó.N.: Monitor Against Mexicans Over Nationwide
